message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $700000. However, I'm willing to compromise and offer you the product for $850000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you'll find it hard to find a better deal elsewhere.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not convinced that $850000 is the right price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $775000. Can you consider this price?

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go below $875000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $825000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident it's still a great deal.

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $825000 is the right price. I'm willing to make one more offer, and I'm thinking of $790000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're willing to make one more offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $850000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $815000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I hope you can see the value in this offer.

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $815000. I'm starting to think that I might be better off looking elsewhere, but I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll meet you at $795000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're making a final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $825000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $800000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I hope you can see the value in this offer.
I'm not willing to pay $800000, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $780000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. This is my final offer.
